title: Roscommon Climate Story : The  disappearing lake  that no longer disappears
content:
Search for articles

[Roscommon](https://www.independent.ie/regionals/roscommon)

[Change county](https://www.independent.ie/regionals/change-county)

Flooding and wildfires are becoming twin concerns in the landlocked county

![Farmer Tom Carney with neighbours Leo Kenny and Laurence Fallon as they clear out his sheep shed, which was flooded by the swelling of Lough Funshinagh in 2020. Photo: Brian Farrell](https://focus.independent.ie/thumbor/KoNuHfsG4n3QLvG3m7qtig06dN4=/0x0:3238x2158/960x640/prod-mh-ireland/24b79c87-213a-467b-ab47-cefd75efe44a/9571b4e0-b4d2-45c1-978e-05470b3e4c32/ood%20Rahara189%2010021.jpg)

Farmer Tom Carney with neighbours Leo Kenny and Laurence Fallon as they clear out his sheep shed, which was flooded by the swelling of Lough Funshinagh in 2020. Photo: Brian Farrell

![Fionnuala Mee with a newborn lamb that should be running in a field that is flooded in Funshinagh, Co Roscommon in 2024. Photo: Brian Farrell](https://focus.independent.ie/thumbor/3sqs1MmrMgjN88kt9D9vBpJBgEc=/0x0:3238x2158/960x640/prod-mh-ireland/d04de52f-239f-46cc-8aa3-abf59e3a2cc4/c439de99-a295-4c33-9fd3-b28fcbc25ef3/Lough%20Funshinagh512.jpg)

Fionnuala Mee with a newborn lamb that should be running in a field that is flooded in Funshinagh, Co Roscommon in 2024. Photo: Brian Farrell

![Brian and Mary Fallon had to vacate their home by Lough Funshinagh due to flooding. Photo: Brian Farrell](https://focus.independent.ie/thumbor/dJ1IfGqJdTezjPVBKe7EEIKJuzU=/0x0:3238x2158/960x640/prod-mh-ireland/1475b520-b114-4af8-b32d-6b4957cf0186/1160e22d-05c2-406f-b324-315b3d09f0cc/Lough%20Funshinagh495.jpg)

Brian and Mary Fallon had to vacate their home by Lough Funshinagh due to flooding. Photo: Brian Farrell

![Flooding at Lough Funshinagh, Co Roscommon. Photo: Lough Funshinagh Flood Crisis/Facebook](https://focus.independent.ie/thumbor/kLwF3Ic_qjsA2g7MJ7saI3od6hs=/0x80:960x720/960x640/prod-mh-ireland/e91f96a5-8821-46ee-b8b4-c1782b3d8f70/52ed3dc6-d55c-49b5-adcb-8582e1552f82/e91f96a5-8821
